languages.text: Шевельнулись скелетные пальцы, и из тьмы соткалась подле трона Его тень Домин. Скована она была черными цепями и погружена в сон. Молчал Неумирающий, ибо настал черед предлагать плату — ведь ничто не дарит Смерть без платы. И пообещал{mf||а} Неумирающему Домин...

The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...
languages.original_text: Шевельнулись скелетные пальцы, и из тьмы соткалась подле трона Его тень Домин. Скована она была черными цепями и погружена в сон. Молчал Неумирающий, ибо настал черед предлагать плату — ведь ничто не дарит Смерть без платы. И пообещал{mf||а} Неумирающему Домин...

The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment. And the Enim promised the Undying One...

The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...

languages.text: Die skelettierten Finger rührten sich, und der Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin zeichnete sich in der Dunkelheit neben Seinem Thron ab. Sie war mit schwarzen Ketten gefesselt und schlief. Der Todlose war stumm: Es war Zeit, eine Bezahlung anzubieten, denn der Tod würde nichts preisgeben, ohne etwas dafür zu bekommen. Und {mf|der|die} Domin versprach dem Todlosen ...
languages.original_text: The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...

traits.locale_text: Die skelettierten Finger rührten sich, und der Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin zeichnete sich in der Dunkelheit neben Seinem Thron ab. Sie war mit schwarzen Ketten gefesselt und schlief. Der Todlose war stumm: Es war Zeit, eine Bezahlung anzubieten, denn der Tod würde nichts preisgeben, ohne etwas dafür zu bekommen. Und {mf|der|die} Domin versprach dem Todlosen ...

languages.text: Los esqueléticos dedos se movieron, y la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin emergió de entre la oscuridad que había junto al trono. Estaba atada con cadenas negras y dormida. El Inmortal guardaba silencio. Era hora de ofrecer un pago, pues la Muerte no renuncia a nada sin exigir algo a cambio. Esta fue la oferta de{mf|l| la} Domin al Inmortal...
languages.original_text: The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...

traits.locale_text: Los esqueléticos dedos se movieron, y la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin emergió de entre la oscuridad que había junto al trono. Estaba atada con cadenas negras y dormida. El Inmortal guardaba silencio. Era hora de ofrecer un pago, pues la Muerte no renuncia a nada sin exigir algo a cambio. Esta fue la oferta de{mf|l| la} Domin al Inmortal...

languages.text: 骨になった指が動き、ドミンの影が主の王座のそばの暗闇から現れた。彼女は黒い鎖に縛られて眠っていた。不死の者は沈黙していた。死は見返りなくして何も返さぬため、今こそが代償を捧げる時であった。そしてドミンは不死の者に約束した…
languages.original_text: The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...

traits.locale_text: 骨になった指が動き、エニムの影が主の王座のそばの暗闇から現れた。彼女は黒い鎖に縛られて眠っていた。不死の者は沈黙していた。死は見返りなくして何も返さぬため、今こそが代償を捧げる時であった。そしてエニムは不死の者に約束した…

languages.text: 不死之神白森森的手指动了一下，秘者的影子从黑暗之中浮现，出现在了祂的王座旁边，被黑色的锁链捆住，一动不动。不死之神一言不发：付出代价的时候到了，若是不愿付出任何代价，死亡便绝对不会施以仁慈。秘者对不死之神做出了承诺……
languages.original_text: The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...

traits.locale_text: 不死之神白森森的手指动了一下，秘者的影子从黑暗之中浮现，出现在了祂的王座旁边，被黑色的锁链捆住，一动不动。不死之神一言不发：付出代价的时候到了，若是不愿付出任何代价，死亡便绝对不会施以仁慈。秘者对不死之神做出了承诺……

languages.text: Les doigts squelettiques remuèrent, et des ténèbres derrière Son trône surgit l'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin, liée par des chaînes noires et endormie. L'Immortel demeura silencieux ; l'heure était venue d'offrir un paiement, car la Mort ne donnait jamais rien sans rien. Et {mf|le|la} Domin promit à l'Immortel...
languages.original_text: The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...

languages.text: İskeletin parmakları kıpırdanmaya başladı. Domin'in gölgesi ise O'nun tahtının ardındaki karanlıktan meydana çıktı. Kara zincirlere vurulmuştu, uyuyordu. Ölmeyen sessizdi. Artık ifa vakti gelmişti. Çünkü Ölüm, karşılığını almadan hiçbir şey vermezdi. Domin'in Ölmeyen'e vadettiği ise...
languages.original_text: The skeletal fingers stirred, and the Domin's shadow loomed out of the darkness beside His throne. She was bound in black chains and asleep. The Undying One was silent: now was the time to offer a payment, as Death would give nothing away without payment in return. And the Domin promised the Undying One...
